course_description: System programming topics are illustrated by the POSIX API to the Linux operating system. Topics include: file i/o, the TTY driver, window systems, processes, shared memory, message passing, semaphores, signals, and interrupt handlers.
prerequisites: CS 253 and CS 255 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisites.
